Description: Automating the quarantine process for tickets with last mile issues but affected by core/transport trouble to prevent truck roll.

Project Name: Facebook Chat Ad via FB Messenger Chatbot
Description: Currently, we are implementing digital campaigns to drive traffic to our website (pldthome.com). Main objective is for the web visitors to avail for a PLDT Home product. Thus, to generate incremental leads and maximize our new digital platform - Messenger Chat bot, we will run digital advertisements via Facebook Chat ad leading to the PLDT Home Facebook Messenger bot. This ad will be served to targeted Facebook users.

Project Name: WFSC Nationwide Rollout for WAR and PR
Description: Nationwide rollout of Workforce Management tool which manages Warranty Assurance Requests (WAR) and Provisioning Requests (PR); With SMS functionality to customers on date of technician visit
SMS confirming if a customer concern has been resolved (alignment of closed SMS for SDM and OFSC Inside & Outside Activities)

Project Name: Enhancement of DAR, First bill and Amortized Aging Report
Description:
Optimization
To support the auditing requirements of Credit QA by adding the requested fields and 
alignment of extraction criteria based on the original document.
Proponent:
PM: Myleen Rodriguez
Proponent: Ian Simbulan/Rose Pimentel
Value Impact:
Cost avoidance/savings as it will automate the manual reports preparation.
Improve NOPSA.

Description:
Optimization
This is in compliance to the Audit/SGV requirement to establish a standard extraction period of Accounts Receivable for Retail reports - CCB, Impairment and Aging reports.

It would help us in the report preparation because currently we are only relying to an adhoc report for Retention. If this will be automated, we would have a regular source with all the fields needed for analysis. See below for sample May 2021 vs. April 2021 Retention accounts. For other reports, these are logic and additional fields enhancement, it would also help our team in providing in-depth analysis in terms of customer and account profiling.    

•	May Retention total accounts increased by 52% compared to April 2021.
•	May Retention with no payment after 30 days increased to 25%  (6,660) versus 20% (3,478) of Apr 2021.
•	Overall, no payment since Retention after 60 days is 2% or 553 accounts as of August 31 with 3.4M aging balances.
Proponent:
PM: Myleen Rodriguez
Proponent: Ian Simbulan
Value Impact:
Cost avoidance/savings as it will automate the manual reports preparation.
SGV/Audit compliance

Project Name: Creation of No Payment Since Retention Report (NPSR)
Description:
Optimization
To have a flexible report based on the preferred views e.g. performance per Channel, Regional, Store/Team level or up to agents’ level. This report allows users to view, drill down, slice and dice reports. This also helps Credit to identify the actual status of a specific cart (e.g. from what store cart was created, when was created, agent who encode, the current status of the application, etc.
Proponent:
PM: Myleen Rodriguez
Proponent: Ian Simbulan/Rose Pimentel
Value Impact:
Cost avoidance/savings as it will automate the manual reports preparation.
Improve Credit policies for Retention and therefore, improve EPDA.

Description:

Customer, account and service details are needed, as reference for management reporting on profiles of NOPSA, Churn, etc. These are basis for policy or process enhancements. This report is part of the original Panorama requirements called Customer/Account Level Inventory Report.

Answer level/FTTR
Increase in Agent Occupancy

Description: This request was filed in compliance to GDPO's cookie management initiative.     DPMAP project is a project wherein GDPO is implementing the OneTrust software in digital assets in order to support data privacy compliance. One of the features of OneTrust is the cookie consent compliance, which must be implemented in the website.                            A script will be provided to be configured such that the consent which will be asked to the user of site will vary depending on the cookie type.

Project Name: Bounced Check Notification and Auto Letter Creation
Description:
To automate the bounced check letter sending to subscribers and provide option to auto send via email
Savings is not that much due to low volume of qualified accounts.

Cost efficient because a letter is automatically generated upon tagging of redirection/suspension. Team leaders need not manually generate the letter that could cause added job for them
Proponent:
PM: Khristeen Valera
Proponent: Lorna Lucas
Value Impact:
Ph7,800 Annual savings if bounced checked letter will be sent via email

Computation of projection:
Ave. count of accts with bounced check/month = 86
Ave. count of accts qualified for Letter sending = 50
Cost of letter sending (paper, mailing) = 13
Cost /month = 650
Cost/year = 7,800

Project Name: TU Credit Scoring w/ Hotspot Brgy - Home Phase 1a
Description: TransUnion will provide credit scoring of customers at point of application for selected hotspot barangay (hotspot barangay - areas being tagged with high percentage of no payment since activation or NOPSA)
Value Impact: TransUnion project aims to curtail the NOPSA rate that is currently at an average of 9% to a maximum of 5% only which would result in a lower NOPSA AR cost that is currently at an average of P48M/mo to P27M/mo only or a savings of P252M for 1 year.
KPI: To improve the NOPSA rate to 5% or below vs current’s average of 9% and to increase the active rate 6 months after activation to at least 90% vs current’s 82% only.

Project Name: Recon Call Flow Enhancement/ Recon IVRS Enhancement Phase 1
Description:
Enhanced auto-reconnection of a disconnected account via IVRS. Enhancement includes determining if an account s:
• Qualified for reconnection
• With existing reconnection request or account is with open service order; or
• With failed payment for the past three (3) months
Value Impact:
Ph 72M annual savings

(116K calls per month or Ph 6M savings per month)

Project Name:
Project eSOA Revamp 
(incorporated request from CR DMND0002584 and myHome related projects)
Description:
Redesign of PDF copy of Statement of Account (SOA) such that customers need to input birthdate instead of 10-digit account number for easier  & more convenient access
Demand also includes the ff: status of esoa sending/ recipient, change of landing page to myHome log-in page when "View Billing" is clicked in compliance with DP's guidance, removal of password encryption when accessing eSOA via myHome/apps, FUSE and Barslite but, will be pw protected once eSOA is sent, campaigns offer portion in ESOA
Value Impact:
> Inq on bill delivery: estimated cost savings is P485K
> Removal of pdf copy of eSOA (FUSE/Barslite): reduction of ave call handling time (ACHT) by 12 sec/ or .20 mins/call.  
   (from 9.71 mins to 9.51 mins/call. project is an enabler to maintain same rate of P53/call upon renewal of contract per coord with Mr. Lucky Mariano)
> Estimated Additional revenue for the inclusion of campaigns c/o Marketing
KPI:
reduction in inquiries and complaints in accessing eSOA
reduction of call handling time
Additional revenue from campaign
DP compliance on the landing page to view SOA

Project Name:
Project Argus
- Enable front liners to view all customer interaction across multiple channels in Optima
Description:
1. Create an empowered environment where customer-facing professionals can address questions and resolve issues faster and accurately.
2. Allow customers to view and manage their own transactions.
3. Enable the organization to map out strategic decisions/programs based on insights from ‘single source of truth’ about the customer.
Proponent:
TECHICO, Eden Remedios (Eden) B. 
ABAD, Maria Cecilia (Chiqui) H.

Description:
Allows our organization to plan, manage, and track employee work
 
•	3000 licenses are required to schedule all CSRs, track adherence and employee work
•	Integration of this tool with COSMO, Salesforce, and other tools is required
•	All WFM requirements will be shared separately

This tool will help increase accuracy of volume forecast and service level projections. These cannot be manipulated which will help the delivery of better services. Real-time decisions are made easier as information from other tools feed to this. Resources are calibrated better against projected workload

Project Name: AUTO GO GREEN ENROLLMENT VIA PLDT HOMEBILL SMS & IVRS
Description:
•	To automate the Go Green (Paperless billing) enrollment process requested via PLDT Home Billing SMS service
•	To simplify and hasten the go green enrollment process via PLDT Home Billing SMS service for better customer experience
•	Introduce a menu option in our existing IVRS when calling 171 via landline and mobile

Knowledge Management Platform that can:
•	Deliver consistent Customer Service experience across the organization
•	Improve Accuracy and Efficiency of resolution using guided workflows
•	Better and faster decision making (Reduced wait time)- Improves Solution Assess
•	Improved troubleshooting accuracy and avoid incorrect diagnosis
•	Faster problem-solving - AHT Reduction of 10% to 15%

Need a Learning  Management Platform that can:
•	Increase training effectiveness and knowledge retention to drive better RESOLUTION performance
•	Enhance existing training content and delivery approach (Gamified Learning, Simulations and experiential learning modules). Making it more appealing to our new generation workforce
•	Improve speed to proficiency of New Hire agents
•	Improve our knowledge management approach (Real time tracking and reporting of knowledge assessments)

Quality Assurance Management platform with the following features
•	Evaluate different channels for quality and store data in a central location (real-time)
•	Fully customizable and can adapt to the quality needs of the business
•	Automated sampling (Random allocation of transactions to monitor
•	Provide automated reports and Analytics
•	Improved Employee Engagement

Description: To comply with Finance's requirement to send last billing if total amount due (TAD) is credit or zero in case there is a need to recognize credit balance as a revenue. This will address the current practice wherein final bill is not generated/ sent to customers if the total amount due (TAD) is credit, zero or no monthly service fee although there are transactions like debit/ cr adjustment or payments. As a result, SR is issued to generate and send SOA, which takes time plus with  corresponding charges in excess of allowable SRs based on the contract with Amdocs.
Value Impact: No annual est yet but with accumulated credit balance (2016 and prior years) amtg to Ph524M of which Ph147M was implemented last Feb2021 (source: Recovery Coll Mgmt)
KPI: Reduction in billing related concerns, Revenue recognition, Improved Customer Experience

Description:
To improve credit application verification by reducing NOPSA rates down to 5% and keeping active rates at minimum of 90% six months from activation.  - what is the difference of this from DMND0007612 - the other demand is for capturing of customer consent to share data to TU.

Description:
Includes the following projects below:
1) IVRS Auto Detection of Barring of Internet (BIN) Accounts
* Development of a system to automatically detect BIN accounts or to expose the API, if already available. 
* Automatic detection to avoid errors due to manual intervention.
* File updating in a timely manner giving a more accurate information.
* Enhancement of the process in determining accounts under BIN.

2) Lifting Enhancement of Smart Postpaid
* Promotion of self-care facility to get the billing and account details via IVRS without the need to speak with a live agent. 
* Availability of the needed account balance information via SMS. 
* Generation of a report indicating the reconnection and SMS transaction details.
	Reduction of the hotline call volume for requests by at least 16%.

3) Auto Lifting for SUN Postpaid
* Accommodation of the subscribers request for service restoration.

Description:
* Promotion of self-care facilities will allow subscribers will make use of his time efficiently without the need to speak with a live agent. 
* Provision of an avenue to proactively update subscribers on the status of their pending request or concerns.

* Reduction of the hotline call volume by at least 8% for balance inquiries and 26% for follow up of service requests.

Project Name: Auto Registration to SMART Prepaid and TNT Promos
Description:
* To educate our subscribers on the latest promo packages with corresponding description, amount and validity.
* To encourage self-service facility from providing promo details to auto-registration of the account without the need to speak with a CSR.
* To extend assistance and help gain sales.
* Generation of a report indicating the MINs who availed of the promo package, date and time, airtime balance, invalid requests and reason for unsuccessful transaction.
* To reduce the call volume of hotline for inquiries by at least 2%.

Project Name:
Transunion (TU) TUDF via iCSP
- Data Contribution Consent (2nd tickbox) in Optima, CSP, Data Consent Platform (Note: This Demand is for Cancellation)
Description: As part of the reciprocity agreement with TU, PLDT & Smart as a member is required to contribute customer data to TU for as long as consent by the customer is secured.  Failure to comply would mean restriction of our access to the TU database.  All customer consent tickboxes should be enabled ASAP to eliminate the manual tracking being done ( sharepoint process is a major painpoint and prone to human error) .  TU's original deadline was Feb 2022 but has given us until end of July to make sure all our system enhancements are completed. Data contribution should be submitted by August 1.
Value Impact: Improvement of NOPSA to consistently be below 5% ;  Subs health / active rates 6 months after activation to be minimum 90% , Drastically improve mean time to approve within 30 minutes from SR staging to evaluation;  Manage credit risk and lower down provision for doubtful accts /losses ( ie be within PDA  target for 2022)
KPI: NOPSA rate, Subs health rate, MTTCA SLA, PDA rate

Project Name: PLDT DFO: Auto Line Testing in WFSC
Description: Currently, each WAR ticket coming into WFSC is manually reassessed by WMAs, where a manual line test is executed during the pre-dispatch stage. This is manual effort expended for each WAR ticket prior to dispatch to Technicians, resulting in additional time taken before ticket can be worked on by Technician, which eventually translates to negative customer experience. Once Technician completes resolving customer’s connection issue, WMAs manually validate each completed WAR ticket by performing another line test before ticket closure, resulting in additional manual effort.

Project Name:
PLDT/SMART Conversational AI for 
Twitter, Viber, IVR
Description:
Ccare needs below capabilities to improve handling of customers requests via IVR/Chatbot 
I.  Conversational AI – to have an automated process and automated interaction at the first entry of the customer
- Virtual Agent 
 -  Voice IVR/Cosmo 
- Chat – Oracle Digital Assistant 
- Messaging App (Viber, Wattsapp, Telegram) 
 - Social (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram)
- Virtual Assist – (hotline, back office, social media) agent to have a knowledge power, able to view what was transcribed at the beginning of the call or chat 
 Voice of the customer – automated sending of survey to get customer satisfaction if customer opt to talk to an agent 
- IVR /Chatbot– to be able to turn virtual agent to provide positive utterance and to have specific response based on customer intent. Below are the functionalities needed to be successful in handling calls using AI.
II. Voice of the Customer – PILOT
To have a unified CSAT platform that can collect the customer feedback in real time and to have a dashboard that is customizable and web based.  This can be used by the hotline and social and other self-care channels that would trigger survey to the customers. Below are the capabilities needed to improve customer experience with regards to CSAT surveys.
Critical Report Metrics
•	The reports will be per channel where AI is deployed. 
•	For IVR and AI, volume and breakdown of interactions with virtual agent, 
•	% of handover to agent, 
•	% of handled by virtual agent 
•	breakdown of all customer intents
•	This metrics will be applied also to Viber bot where AI driven will be deployed.
Updating of payment file format of Metrobank which will help process payments P1M and above at any given time

Based on YTD 2021 data

•	Volume reduction of 2,071 average daily volume of follow up intent for Chatbot and save P130k per day 
•	Volume reduction of 1, 018 average daily volume of follow up intent for Hotline and save P42k per day

Description:
We need a Quality Sampling tool that will allow us to:

•	Extract all transactions from COSMO and SALESFORCE on a particular period
•	Randomize/ Pick transactions and set criteria for calls that will be randomly picked such as:
-	Number of calls to select
-	Date of interaction (Date Range From: and To: )
-	Set rules such as pick interactions with interval of 15 interactions and etc..
-	Randomly allocate the random interactions picked to QA Vendor partners (per site, per LOB, per QA)

Description:
Pro-Active Increase in Credit Limit  (Optima/AIA)
- Targeted subscribers are given the option to 
update to a pre-approved Credit Limit via SMS
- Increase revenue
Proponent:
PM: Aileen Borbon
Proponent: Jeanne Tapiculin/Aileen Borbon
Value Impact:
For Jan - June 2021, the monthly average qualified accounts were 4,329 and an average of 282 or 6.51% accounts availed of the proactive increase in credit limit (PICL) monthly.
If these PICL-availed accounts maximize their new CL, the projected average increase in usage is 31%.

Description: Creation of Trade queue allows Operations to efficiently allocate staffing resources based on the arrival of volume. Unique queue will also determine the specific performance of the program.

Project Name: IVRS Smart Prepaid Account Balance Enhancement
Description:
* Proactively offer balance and registration details at the onset of call thereby giving assistance to hotline in reducing call volume.
* Inclusion of account details in the IVRS recording spiel other than the airtime balance would provide subscribers the information without the need to speak with an agent.
* Decreased journey time as the information is already available at the top level.

Project Name:
Salesforce Enhancement - 
PLDT Salesforce Automated & Enhanced Case Flow (Inflow & Backlog)
Description:
The new inflow and baclog flow aims to:
•	simplify routing of case requiring agent resolution
•	optimize resource by automating steps that are currently being done by the agents manually
•	prioritize VIP, accounts and cases requiring urgent attention (customer segmentation initiative)
•	route critical cases to the right group (High Value Care)
KPI:
•	To improve customer experience (NPS & CSAT)
•	To increase productivity (CPH)
•	To increase productive hours (Occupancy)
